about_the_game:
More than 100 choices. The entire duration of video is more than 240 minutes.
Entangling the relationship between characters: 4 heroes，each has 5 possible destinies. Every choice will not only affect Lin Luojing and her beloved man, but also change the fate of everyone.
Control of destiny: the performs of players in the game will lead to different endings. To be or not to be, that's a question.
Comfortable play mode: You can manipulate the video progress bar, fast forward to the next chapter with ease and play with multiple speeds. All of these ensure a comfortable viewing experience.
Game / video balance: The game supports video play, giving you a new balance between gaming and viewing experience.
detailed_description:
More than 100 choices. The entire duration of video is more than 240 minutes.
Entangling the relationship between characters: 4 heroes，each has 5 possible destinies. Every choice will not only affect Lin Luojing and her beloved man, but also change the fate of everyone.
Control of destiny: the performs of players in the game will lead to different endings. To be or not to be, that's a question.
Comfortable play mode: You can manipulate the video progress bar, fast forward to the next chapter with ease and play with multiple speeds. All of these ensure a comfortable viewing experience.
Game / video balance: The game supports video play, giving you a new balance between gaming and viewing experience.
name: 绝世千金-Unique Lady

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 9 MB available space

short_description: Unique Lady is an FMV (full-motion video) love game. The story centers around the prime minister's daughter named Lin Luojing. She is involved in a huge conspiracy which is related to the 4 heroes, during the time she lives in Shengjing.
